item.title: Test
item.description: If I can see this there is a post in the folder.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to RubeHicksCube! This is a test site I wanted to make in order to test out a static site generator, which enables me to make sites using templates, but also have far better speed and control over the content of the site. WordPress would need about 10 different plugins after installation to do what this site can do with a click of a button. The only complication is getting it installed and actaully using it to write content.
